text: Ndu mba ntarar muuŋv guigira Zisas khothɨgɨp ndu khueŋ kaŋgiri, ndu Fhe Bakɨme nɨman bigɨn thueŋ suaŋv simtɨk kɨrga fhu. Gumgi mbari, mbe khueŋ kaŋgi, mbe pham bigɨn mueŋ muuŋgi, mbe ne kaŋgiap, mbe fhura Fhe Bakɨme ganɨrim, ana mbe muuŋgi bigeŋ ndi thɨgar maaŋ thagi. Mbe maaŋ muuŋgiap kav, zumgum mbe Zisas khothɨgi ndɨkndɨk za mbatɨgiap, mbe kem vov, ŋkɨɨar tɨn ndav za mbatɨgi fara muuŋgi.
